name: Lore And Lutes
short_description: Lore And Lutes (L&L) is an open source Ultima style adventure game. Its prominent feature is the editor and ZZT style scripting language which will allow users to easily create their own games. L&L is built on ASFC, so it runs on Linux and Windows.
